effect_entries.effect: Teaches Protect to a compatible Pokémon.
effect_entries.short_effect: Teaches Protect to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen I: Submission)

flavor_text_entries.text:
相手の　攻撃を
まったく　受けない。
連続で　だすと　失敗しやすい。

Enables the user to evade all attacks.
Its chance of failing rises if it is used
in succession.

Permette di eludere tutti gli attacchi.
Se usata in successione può fallire.

Onda de porquería que afecta a todos los
Pokémon de alrededor y puede causar
envenenamiento.

Garantierter Schutz in der Runde, in der
die Attacke eingesetzt wird. Könnte bei
häufigem Einsatz versagen.

Le lanceur esquive toutes les attaques.
Le risque d’échec augmente lorsque la capacité
est utilisée plusieurs fois de suite.

상대의 공격을
전혀 받지 않는다.
연속으로 쓰면 실패하기 쉽다.

こうげきを　まったく　うけない。
わざを　れんぞくで　だすと
しっぱい　しやすくなる。

It enables the user to evade all
attacks. Its chance of failing rises
if it is used in succession.

It enables the user to evade all
attacks. Its chance of failing rises
if it is used in succession.

Le lanceur esquive toutes les attaques.
Plus la capacité est utilisée de fois à la
suite, plus elle risque d’échouer.

It enables the user to evade all
attacks. Its chance of failing rises
if it is used in succession.

attacks. Its chance of failing rises
if it is used in succession.

It enables the user to evade all
attacks. Its chance of failing rises
if it is used in succession.

Enables the user to
evade all attacks.
It may fail if used
in succession.

Negates all damage,
but may fail if used
in succession.

but may fail if used
in succession.
